overview:
Matt Auckland is Founder and Developer of The DJ Book, base in the United Kingdom.

Working in the I.T industry since 1995, Matt has a passion for early computing and video games, a love affair that started in the early 80’s. He also loves discovering and working with new technology, not only on the web, but also in computing and broadcast media.

With experience in radio broadcasting, dance music and DJing, Matt also has a passion for music production, with skills and knowledge in these areas as well as event production and promotion.

Other key interests and skills lie in photography, audio & video production, and the radio sector of the media industry.

Matt is a skilled and experienced web developer and enjoys new challenges.
